title: LEAVER BUSTER
body: Laptop froze and had to restart my computer during loading screen, got in the game by 2 mins and then the game was remade by the opposing team. i was somehow given a 5 match leaver buster. How do i go about getting this resolved?

replies.body: league gave me a fucking 20 min leave q because I lagged out, this piece of shit can go fuck itself in the asshole

An account will receive lower priority queue after multiple leaves.  The only away to return to good standing with [Leaverbuster ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ne5GBw7i-boards-badges-and-posts-not-updating)is by completing your lower priority queue matches and playing consistently without interruptions.  

I know your laptop froze and it may have been out of your control, but all leaves are treated equally because it causes negative experiences for others.  Hopefully that helps clear things up, but please let me know if you have any questions.

Um Hi. I played a game of league. My laptop died, yet I reconnected and played on for the next 25 or so minutes. Got some kills, assists. Finish the game and I get a leaver buster for 20 min? I am trying to comprehend the actual reason of how the leaver buster gives you a leave. Or is this algorithmic program as idiotic as I think it is?
